content.query:
--SELECT * FROM [odw_standardised_db].[dbo].[entra_id]


SELECT TOP (100) 
*
--Employee.EmployeeID,FirstName,LastName,EmailAddress, userPrincipalName, id as EntraID
FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[kat_employee_dim] AS Employee
INNER JOIN [odw_standardised_db].[dbo].[entra_id] AS EntraID 
ON [employee].[EmployeeID] = EntraID.[employeeId]
WHERE Employee.EmployeeID = 50410568


SELECT TOP (100) 
*
FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_employee_dim] AS Employee
WHERE EmployeeID = 50410568


SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(EmployeeID)) FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[kat_employee_dim] WHERE IsActive = 'Y'
